title: 因为一个实体而造成的崩溃，想知道怎么查这个实体的区块
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
-- Entity being ticked --
Details:
        Entity Type: pixelmon:pixelmon (com.pixelmonmod.pixelmon.entities.pixelmon.EntityPixelmon)
        Entity ID: 920
        Entity Name: 螺钉地鼠
        Entity's Exact location: -2119.48, 76.00, -3554.50
        Entity's Block location: World: (-2120,76,-3555), Chunk: (at 8,4,13 in -133,-223; contains blocks -2128,0,-3568 to -2113,255,-3553), Region: (-5,-7; contains chunks -160,-224 to -129,-193, blocks -2560,0,-3584 to -2049,255,-3073)
        Entity's Momentum: 0.00, -0.08, 0.00
        Entity's Passengers: []
        Entity's Vehicle: ~~ERROR~~ NullPointerException: null

但是你还不如把这个打开

打开文件夹 config/ 中的文件 forge.cfg ，将
B:removeErroringEntities=false
B:removeErroringTileEntities=false复制代码
改为
B:removeErroringEntities=true
B:removeErroringTileEntities=true复制代码
